doc:
True Eames Boardman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/True_Eames_Boardman 0 True Eames Boardman (born William True Boardman Jr., October 25, 1909, Seattle, Washington – July 28, 2003, Pebble Beach, California) was an American actor and scriptwriter. Boardman was the only child of actress Virginia Eames and action-adventure star True Boardman. He began acting in 1912 and had acted in six films by the age of 10. True_Eames_Boardman ( born William_True_Boardman_Jr. , October_25_,_1909 , Seattle , Washington – July_28_,_2003 , Pebble_Beach , California ) was an_American_actor_and_scriptwriter . Boardman was the_only_child of actress_Virginia_Eames and action-adventure_star True_Boardman . He began_acting in 1912 and had_acted in six_films by the_age of 10 .
